formatted_address: 13, Jln Niaga Aspira 1/2, GERBANG NUSAJAYA, 81550 Gelang Patah, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Daddy Auto Detailing

reviews.text: First time. I went to Daddy Auto Detailing to get my motorcycle washed, and wah, I really have to give credit to the two guys there. They took their time and did such a solid job—really very detail-oriented. No shortcuts, no simply sapu and finish. Every part of the bike was properly cleaned, and you can see they really care about doing a good job. Took less than an hour, but the quality was tip-top. If you want your bike to look clean and shiny like new, I highly recommend this place. Good service, friendly people, and really worth it! I ride an ADV bike and they really cleaned all the nooks with a brush. Step by step. Small areas at a time.

The Daddy auto detailing shop provides excellent service, with friendly and accommodating owners and staff. I opted for the polish and wax package, which was reasonably priced. Since my home is not too far from the shop, they even offered to pick up and deliver my car once the process was complete. The results were impressive—my car looks clean and shines beautifully!

I had an amazing experience at this car wash today. I initially came looking for a quick wash, but after seeing the results on the car in front of me, I decided to go for the premium wash instead — and I’m so glad I did.

Three hardworking staff handled my car, and they did an outstanding job. Their attention to detail was impressive, and it was clear they took pride in their work. My car looks spotless, both inside and out. Definitely worth it. Highly recommended!

Great service, reasonable pricing, great location. The team handles my car & explains the process very well.

-Edited- they always rejects customers now because of no slot or waiting time will be too long. Just to keep in mind especially when you come unplanned.

Amazing car wash run by a young team. Very honest and passionate about what they do! Returning customer not just because of the friendly staff and the close proximity to tuas checkpoint, but to experience a superb a car wash.

Highly recommended!

vicinity: 13, Jalan Niaga Aspira 1/2, GERBANG NUSAJAYA, Gelang Patah
